subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With the arrival of the Suns in Manhattan, who at 14-3 hold the best mark in the league, the abysmal state of both of the New York area teams became all the more obvious.
snippet: With the arrival of the Suns in Manhattan, who at 14-3 hold the best mark in the league, the abysmal state of both of the New York area teams became all the more obvious.
